name: PlayWith
description:
Everyone got used to regular controls, wasd/zqsd/Arrow Keys

But how much are we used to that

PlayWith is a 2D hardcore platform game where every level have a different key binding
Did you ever jumped with "Y", got to the left with "5" and to the right with "E" ?
With this game you might try this kind of weird controls

30 Original Levels
Enemies who wants to make your life like hell
And a story about an accident...
